sentences.english: The multi-language Babylon dictionary has been inserted on the translation pages at the bottom of the side menu.
sentences.chinese: 網頁底部的菜單已經裝入多語種巴比倫字典。

sentences.english: Japanese in the library cataloguing is not used frequently.
sentences.chinese: 日文在圖書館編目語種中屬於小語種。

sentences.english: Japanese in the library cataloguing is not used frequently.
sentences.chinese: 日文在圖書館編目語種中屬於小語種。

sentences.english: The multi-language software system can be used widely in jointed ventures in China.
sentences.chinese: 多語種的應用軟件在中外合資企業應用前景光明。

sentences.english: Simple multi-lingual environments may need the ability to map languages one to one.
sentences.chinese: 簡單的多語種環境可能需要能夠在語言之間進行映射。

sentences.english: The Confucius Institute Online has opened channels in 9 languages, with 100,000 registered users.
sentences.chinese: 網絡孔子學院開通9個語種，註冊用戶達10萬人。

sentences.english: English and Chinese bilingual edition, in other languages has been streamlined.
sentences.chinese: 英語和中文雙語版，其他語種已被精簡。

sentences.english: The web may even save some mini-languages. But the big winner will be English.
sentences.chinese: 即使網絡能挽救一些小語種，但是大贏家是英語。

sentences.english: You feed it with a string of text and instantly get the result in various other languages.
sentences.chinese: 用戶提供一段文本，它立刻就會給出其他語種的翻譯。

sentences.english: In what language(s) are the design and regulatory documents available?
sentences.chinese: 設計資料和法規性文件是什麼語種？

sentences.english: Multilingual indexing with stop words removal.
sentences.chinese: 多語種索引與停止的話免職。

sentences.english: I'd also really like to see better linking between the different languages of wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 我也希望看到不同語種維基百科有更好的鏈接。

sentences.english: There are also numerous minority languages spoken among immigrant populations.
sentences.chinese: 美國還有很多小語種，這個主要是移民再說。

sentences.english: In languages like French, adjectives and articles have number too.
sentences.chinese: 在法語等語種，形容詞和冠詞也有數的變化。

sentences.english: You can find tutors for most major languages on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在互聯網上找到大部分主要語種的家庭教師。

sentences.english: National minority languages are also welcome to apply for the unique advantages of high tide.
sentences.chinese: 小語種國家以獨特的優勢也迎來申請高潮。

definition: lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently/to know sth inside out/to know sth by heart
tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]

Chinese language (Mandarin), emphasizing its national nature/Chinese as a primary or secondary school subject/Chinese in the context of the Nationalist Government/Guoyu, book of historical narrative c. 10th-5th century BC
